## Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
```

## Download the file

Use `download.file` to get the data

```{r}
download.file("https://github.com/utdata/chj-r-introduction/blob/main/chj-day1-p2/data-raw/All%20Maritime%20I-D%20reports%201.1%20-%204.30%20-%20REDACTED.xlsx", "data-raw/maritime.xlsx")
```

## import the file

```{r}
read_excel("data-raw/maritime-redacted.xlsx") %>% clean_names()
```
